name: Dash Shoot Goal
description:
Dash Shoot Goal is a fast paced
ball game: take immediate control thanks
to a fine gamepad integration and skillful moves.


Features:

  • 2 to 4 players Local Multiplayer
  • Balance teams with AI
  • Practice in Single player
  • Physics based:
    • The ball doesn't stick to your character
    • Counter your opponents by pushing them
    • Use walls for unexpected shot trajectories
  • Super moves:
    • Dash: rush to hit with quick attacks
    • Expand: increase character size to defend your goal
    • Magnet: attract the ball to mislead your opponent
  • Game modes:
    • Classic: the standard unfair experience
    • Newbie love: each point scored reduces the size of the goal for a perfectly balanced game
    • Beature mode (coming soon): events randomly modify the game
  • Full gamepad support
  • Keyboard controls for 2 players
